OrderSubsystem

Interface OrderCollectionsInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrderCollections

    public interface OrderCollectionsInterface
    Interface for the Order Collections class implemented by the OrderCollections
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    James McCarthy

    • Method Detail

      • createOrder

        Receipt createOrder(Order order)
        After the Order Object is created with payment information and all requires attributes filled. The order may be created and added to the DB in the appropriate table.
        Parameters:
        order - - Order passed into to create the receipt
        Returns:
        The Receipt of Purchase for displaying to the user

      • addToCart

        boolean addToCart(ProductManagementSystem.Product product)
        Used to add Products to the Cart data Structure for the Order
        Parameters:
        product - - Product to be added to the cart
        Returns:
        true or false if the product is added successfully

      • removeFromCart

        boolean removeFromCart(java.lang.String productId)
        Used to remove Products from the Cart data Structure for the Order
        Parameters:
        productId - - The ID of the Product/
        Returns:
        Returns true or false if the products is removed from the cart

      • updateCartQuantity

        boolean updateCartQuantity(java.lang.String productId)
        Used to updates the quantity of a specific item in the cart.
        Parameters:
        productId - - The ID of the Product
        Returns:
        returns true or false if the quantity is updated successfully

      • makePayment

        Order makePayment(Order order)
        Returns an Order that can be used by the Create Order Method
        Returns:
        Order that has been filled with the payment information

      • cancelOrder

        boolean cancelOrder(java.lang.String OrderId)
        Used by the User to Cancel an Order from their Order History By Passing in the Order ID of the Order to be cancelled.
        Parameters:
        OrderId - - Id of the Order
        Returns:
        True or False whether or not the Order was Cancelled or not

      • shipOrder

        boolean shipOrder(java.lang.String OrderId)
        Used by the Client to ship the User Order from their Client interface
        Parameters:
        OrderId - - Id of the Order
        Returns:
        True or false whether the Order has been shipped or not

      • viewOrderHistory

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Order> viewOrderHistory()
        Displays the Order History for the User. The Orders the User has made are extracted from the DB and displays them.
        Returns:
        Returns the Hash Map for the ORder History
